[[inst_slliw]]
==== SLLIW

*Syntax:* slliw SrcL, shamt, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Shift Left Logical by register or immediate amount.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_slliw.svg[SLLIW encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
